item.title: Session 10 (maybe)
item.description: Fresh off their successful home invasion of the EMERALD ENCHANTER, intrepid Thulian adventurers Flynn the Fortunate, Marvus the Wolf, and Ovek the Tall, along with their loyal half-beast henchman Grimbok, head into the JUNGLE OF BURA for some routine archaeological looting. Unfortunately, the targeted structure –ruins of the elvish LAPIS OBSERVATORY– is found to be currently occupied by the ELD, and the party is sucked into an INTERDIMENSIONAL RIFT (It was Ovekâ€™s fault.)
